formatDescription: FO file is a XML data file containing an electronic form intended for usage in the 602XML applications. The form is a composure of the layout structure using XSL-FO, data instance and data model using generic XML elements defined in the 602XML framework. The whole electronic form structure is always embedded into a digital signature represented by XML elements of the XML Signature standard.
provenanceCompoundName: The National Archives of the Czech Republic / The National Archives of the Czech Republic

internalSignatures.name: FO File
internalSignatures.note: Within the first 4000 hex byte pairs 'fo:root'
